entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this morning then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle early this morning. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 9. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Wednesday 18 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Overcast. Low minus 10.
